jcr:content.jcr:description: Get out there and get hiking with all-day versatility in the LP Alpine. With an Altra EGO™ midsole and FootShape™ comfort, this all-over hiker is ready to roam.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Lone Peak Alpine

video.description: Lifestyle shots of a man and woman wearing the new Lone Peak Alpine shoe.
video.name: Altra Running Lone Peak Alpine

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE ALL-NEW LP ALPINE:
LONE PEAK PERFORMANCE
WITH ALL-DAY VERSATILITY

customhtml2.customHTML: Ready, set, go anywhere with the LP Alpine. With an Altra EGO™ midsole and FootShape™ comfort, this all-over hiker is ready to roam.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
FROM TRAIL TO TOWN

Lone Peak performance with all-day versatility means you can go straight from a hike to happy hour.

image.alt: Instep shot of Altra Running LP Alpine Women's shoe in Taupe

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
DO-IT-ALL DURATREAD™

Our dense rubber outsole is designed to last longer and offer grip on both tame and technical terrain.

image.alt: Sole shot of Altra Running LP Alpine shoe
Woman walking in the Altra LP Alpine

customhtml2.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Top of shoe shot of the Women's Altra LP Alpine in Taupe
